text: Midnight Masquerade is a 2014 American/Canadian romantic comedy. It was directed by Graeme Campbell and starred Autumn Reeser and Christopher Russell, premiering on Hallmark Channel on October 26, 2014.Original Trailer == Plot == In this modern-day reverse Cinderella story, a young and naive lawyer, exploited by his boss, gets his life turned around after meeting the beautiful Elyse Samford, CEO of a candy company. Their first date takes place at the annual Halloween masquerade ball. ==Cast== *Autumn Reeser as Elyse Samford *Christopher Russell as Rob Carelli *Richard Burgi as Howard Samford *Helen Colliander as Ruby *Damon Runyan as Emmett Higgins *Neil Crone as Sam *Danny Smith as Andrew Higgins ==References== ==External links== * Category:2014 television films Category:Canadian television films Category:Films shot in Ontario Category:Hallmark Channel original films Category:2014 romantic comedy films Category:Films with screenplays by Patricia Resnick
title: Midnight Masquerade
